caption.title: Estimated 2017 incidence of severe yellow fever infection per 100,000 persons across 34 African countries.
caption.p: A: FOI model, B: R 0 model. For the R 0 model, provinces with no incidence are those for which the estimated vaccination coverage in 2017 was larger than the Critical Vaccination Coverage implied by R 0. Maps were produced from GADM version 2.0.
